ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.controller.player
Class AbstractPlayerController

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.controller.player.AbstractPlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlaybackInfoBroadcaster, IPlayerController, IPlayerListenerInformer, IPlaylistListenerInformer, IReadOnlyPlayerController, IPlaylistManager, IReadOnlyPlaylistManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliPlayerController
public abstract class AbstractPlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayerController, IPlaylistManager, IPlaybackInfoBroadcaster, IPlayerListenerInformer, IPlaylistListenerInformer

Manager for everything player or playlist related. This class can be used safely once isReady returns true.

Constructor Summary
